document_title: Septic arthritis: Causes, signs, treatment, prevention
subsection_content:
There is no way to prevent all risks of septic arthritis. Practicing absolute asepsis when performing procedures and joint surgery is the most effective prevention method. In addition, you also need to completely treat other types of infections in the body such as skin, soft tissue and bones.
Orthopedic Trauma Center, Tam Anh General Hospital System, is home to a team of leading experts, experienced, dedicated, and enthusiastic surgeons such as: TTND.Prof.Dr. Nguyen Viet Tien, Associate Professor Dang Hong Hoa, Associate Professor Tang Ha Nam Anh, Associate Professor Tran Anh Vu, Associate Professor Do Tien Dung, Associate Professor Vu Huu Dung... This is also one of the pioneering units. in diagnosing and treating musculoskeletal diseases with modern techniques according to the world's leading advanced protocols
The hospital is also equipped with a system of modern machinery and imaging equipment such as: Somatom Drive 768-slice CT scanner, new generation magnetic resonance machine Magnetom Amira BioMatrix, bone density measuring machine, ultrasound machine. minus…; Opmi Vario 700 Zeiss surgical microscope system, Meera-Maquet operating table... to be able to detect injuries early and successfully surgically treat musculoskeletal diseases...
Tam Anh General Hospital also owns a spacious clinic system and high-class boarding area; modern rehabilitation area; Comprehensive post-operative care process helps patients quickly recover and stabilize their health after surgery.

Infectious arthritis, when treated promptly, will help preserve intact joint function and prevent permanent joint destruction. One of the important factors that help the treatment process be highly effective is prompt care, drainage and use of appropriate antibiotics to quickly completely destroy disease-causing bacteria.
